Posts.Content: Aug 17, 2010 03:22AM - edited Aug 17, 2010 04:26AM by Hooponopono Dear BcMomOf3, many people think: "if alternative cancer treatments exist, that work, why don't they get approved by the FDA?"  They should take a look at the following clips:  http://naturalnews.tv/v.asp?v=C5E3FA45A61C64961E590573EC1FDF2F http://naturalnews.tv/v.asp?v=26E875D159E63E72B4478284AF7A3AFC http://naturalnews.tv/v.asp?v=AC62E71C79ABD8893B4912A76E88589F http://naturalnews.tv/v.asp?v=1E19F7816690AF08AC2EB2A4D01F90D6 http://naturalnews.tv/v.asp?v=048F4951FA3686194A297EEBB9819637 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PnsQVEbJBuI&feature=related I've read many books about alternative cancer treatments, most of them written by real doctors (who turned away from delivering toxic 'medicine' to already ill people) and they all had similar experiences with the FDA as shown in these videos. God bless

Posts.Content: Aug 16, 2010 06:58AM - edited Aug 16, 2010 07:06AM by Hooponopono Hi BcMomOf3, My girlfriend was diagnosed with malignant breast cancer (two tumors) and was adviced to have a mastectomy, followed by chemo and radiation (Mammo, April 2th, 2009 - biopsy, June 2009). We found out, a few hours before the operation, about German New Medicine (GNM) - and later about B17/Amygdalin. She didn't have any conventional treatment (not even drugs), but went along with GNM and B17/Amygdalin and now, 16 months after the mammo, she feels better than ever. During the last year I've taken a deep interest in alternative therapies (not only for cancer) and been doing alot of investigation/research. It's my personal conviction that conventional medicine not only hasn't got a clue about disease (they only treat symptoms, which is a very lucrative business), but I'm afraid that more people die (or atleast remain ill) because of conventional treatments, than are getting cured. Of course this sounds harsh, but there's just alot of information out there, your doctor/oncologist either doesn't know about, or doesn't want you to know... Maybe you could take a look here, for instance (I have the two books this guy wrote on his experiences with cancer): www.healinghut.net/Liars.html  I do believe that Protocel and other alternative cancer therapies have helped many people to get rid of cancer, but that's my personal opinion, after reading many books on the subject (many written by doctors who turned away from 'modern medicine', Ph.D's and/or cancer patients who got cured by alternative means). Wish you all the best. Ronald
